sentences.english: Lobbyists use slush fund to bribe public officials.
sentences.chinese: 院外集團的說客用賄金拉攏政府官員。

sentences.english: There are new spin-off products aimed at older girls and women, such as sun screen and cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 該集團還推出了太陽鏡和化妝品等新的副產品。

sentences.english: The Distributor is authorized to sub-contract and assign the distribution and sales of the Products to sub-contractors of Fangyuan Group.
sentences.chinese: 發行人已授權轉包及銷售此產品給方園集團的轉包商。

sentences.english: It is better to weed out the bad businesses within the group rather than cross-subsidise them to save face.
sentences.chinese: 將集團內的不良業務剔除，好過爲了面子予以挽救。

sentences.english: Japan is hosting the meeting of delegates from the so-called G8, or group of eight industrialized nations.
sentences.chinese: 日本主持了八國集團代表會議。

sentences.english: The inclusion of any link to other websites does not imply endorsement by the Nestlé Group.
sentences.chinese: 將其他網站置於連結內不代表雀巢集團對其認可。

sentences.english: Greater Khingan Range forestry group, the central government subsidy of $55%.
sentences.chinese: 對大興安嶺林業集團公司，中央財政補貼55%。

sentences.english: The Actavis Group hf. respects the privacy of the visitors to this website.
sentences.chinese: 阿特維斯集團尊重本網站訪問者的隱私。

sentences.english: Interest group comes from some people's maintenance of common interests.
sentences.chinese: 利益集團來自於部分人對共同利益的維護。

sentences.english: Is it really the case that the G8 is prepared to admit to its own stinginess?
sentences.chinese: 八國集團這一次真的要承認自己吝嗇了？

sentences.english: The first skid-mounted drilling rigs exported to Hungary were manufactured by RG PETRO-MACHINERY(GROUP)CO. , LTD.
sentences.chinese: 第一臺出口歐盟的鑽機由南陽二機石油裝備集團製造。

sentences.english: A young policeman has been accused of conspiring with a gang of criminals.
sentences.chinese: 一名年輕警察被指控與一個犯罪集團相勾結。

sentences.english: The Jim Pattison Group also owns the Ripley's Believe It or Not museums.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆帕蒂森集團還擁有裏普利的信不信由你博物館。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter is to discuss the management objectives of Shuhan.
sentences.chinese: 第五章探討蜀漢集團管理思想的目標要求。

sentences.english: You need someone within the organization who is well respected andaware of the political goings-on.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一個在集團裏備受尊重並且瞭解政治動態的人。

sentences.english: Among the whites in the United States it is only the reactionary ruling circles who oppress the black people.
sentences.chinese: 在美國壓迫黑人的，只是白色人種中的反動統治集團。
